The bet came out of a question Piers Morgan asked Oprah: What advice would you give Michael Vick ? games. At the 2009 G-20 summit in Pittsburgh, Google chief executive Eric Schmidt suggested that multiplayer games could provide positive opportunities for improving business training and enhancing workplace collaboration. Speaking at a forum session, Eric Schmidt said: The game world is good training for a career in tech. It teaches players to build a network, to use interactive skills and thinking. Everything in the future online is going to look like a multiplayer game. If I were 15 years old, that's what I would be doing right now. Games appeal to people's natural competitive instinct, creating a sense of frustration and reward that increases engagement with the task at hand. Mengenai jumlah pasukan itu, Donald Rumsfeld mengatakan di dalam buku berjudul Known and Unknown setebal 800 halaman itu: Kalau dilihat kembali, mungkin memang ada benar ada saat-saat dimana lebih banyak tentara bisa membantu. Presiden Bush Tetapi dia menambahkan kalaupun memang para pejabat militer pada saat itu merasa tidak cukup jumlah pasukan untuk menyerbu, mereka tidak pernah memberi tahu dia.
